thread.title: 5 Much Awaited Cars to be Launched in October
thread.title_full: 5 Much Awaited Cars to be Launched in October

title: 5 Much Awaited Cars to be Launched in October
text: 5 Much Awaited Cars to be Launched in October 2nd, Oct 2015 3:46 PM View: 18 0 On account of the upcoming festive season, there is going to be a swarm of cars that will be rolled out on in the market. Festivals are a great opportunity to the automakers to present their offerings with attractive schemes and offers. Moreover, many companies find it profitable to launch their models owing to the buying behaviour of consumers who tend to go on a shopping spree on every special occasion. Even before the arrival of Diwali festival, there is already a list of four-wheelers awaiting the buyers in the country. 5 cars that are going to be launched this month are mentioned here: Maruti Suzuki Baleno This is an all new premium hatchback from the carmaker that will be based on the iK-2 concept. The production has been already commenced at the production facility in Manesar and the scheduled launch is going to be held on 26th of October. Adorned with distinctive cosmetics and modern amenities, could emerge as a new favourite model in its segment. It will be powered by a 1.2 litre K-Series petrol as well as a 1.3 litre DDiS diesel engine, under its hood. It is likely to be placed within the price tag of INR 6-9 Lacs. Deatils on: Maruti Ertiga Maruti Ertiga Facelift The already famous MPV has gone a notch higher with this updated version. It has been already launched in Indonesia, and hence the specs are officially disclosed. Speaking about style, a whole lot of newly designed exterior elements will be found like chrome grille, new alloys along with a chrome strip stretched along the length of the boot lid. It also houses advanced features like Keyless ignition, power windows, automatically adjustable ORVMs, etc. The scheduled launch date is October 10 and the expected price is INR 8 Lacs. Chevrolet Trailblazer This model is going to be potential threat to the popular premium SUVs in the Indian automobile market . It has been revealed in the 2014 Auto Expo followed by its display in July end. All the necessary equipments will be fitted in this vehicle including infotainment system, automatic HVAC, steering mounted audio controls, cruise control, climate control, etc. under its hood, a 2.8 litre diesel motor will do the duty of generating 200 Hp/500 Nm output. It sis believed to be offered around INR 30 Lacs by the end of October. Fiat Abarth Punto Tagged as the hottest hatch, this car will be quiet sporty as well as performance oriented. Standing on 16-inch Scorpion styled alloys, it will have Abarth badges at various potions highlighted by red color. The interior will also be very vivacious flaunting red and yellow stitching on the seats along with a distinctive cockpit area. The 1.4 litre T-Jet petrol engine will be capable enough to make 145 Bhp/ 212 Nm torque. The launch date has been confirmed to take place on October 10 and it will be retailed at INR 10 Lacs. Fiat Abarth Avventura This Abarth powered car will be a tweaked version of the existing Avventura that will be identical to the Abarth Punto in terms of exterior styling. There will be the same 1.4 litre T-Jet engine but with a different ouput amounting to 140 Bhp and 210 Nm. It will be available in shades of white and red, sometime by the end of this month with the price tag of approx INR 12 Lacs.
